channel.title: Hearts of Wulin in the indieRPG newsletter
channel.description: In his last newsletter, Thomas Manuel mentions "Entanglements" from Hearts of Wulin. Strange, as character relationship maps are old as Vampire the Masquerade 1e. I would have chosen "Inner conflict" and Scales, two really great and innovative approaches. But that was nice of him anyway! and it's true that the **list** of entanglements is really neat.
